throne: ^You sit atop a golden throne at the summit of Mount Olympus as clouds scud by.

c: ^ You are Zeus. The bestest, most lightningy god of the pantheon; the Greek one, at least. Ah, this is the life. Just sitting, basking,

throne: ^Look down at the people on earth
fig_or_lit: ^Do you want to look down at people figuratively or literally?

c: ^ You have a nose and intend to look down it.

figuratively: ^No, wait. I mean 'literally'. I always get them mixed up!
^Continue enjoying your position above the riffraff.
feel_superior: ^You try to continue feeling superior to everyone below but they are so far below you (both figuratively AND literally) that you can't muster the hoity toity air you desire.

c: ^ You take a deep breath and shut your eyes to attempt a grand posture,
^ You decide to head down to grace the plebs with your presence.

literally: ^You see what's up by looking down at
map: ^a big map like the one in that documentary film 'Jason and the Argonauts'. You scan the land for
hera: ^ but you're interrupted when Hera arrives.

c: ^? Only your life-partner, your rock, your guiding light, the person who doesn't mind you sleeping around.

hera: ^Give Hera a kiss and a cuddle

c: ^ You approach Hera with arms wide, lips pouting for a smooch. But Hera raises a hand to stop you.
^ Before she can see you, you run away. She doesn't go down to earth very often, so that's where you'll go.

to_uni: ^Hera: What are you doing here? You should be at university. Learning... how to not be so promiscuous.

c: ^ Zeus: Heeerrrraaaa! I was just on my waaaaay.
^You decide to make yourself scarce before Hera can say another word. Earth seems like a good idea.
^ Zeus: I know, hun. I just wanted to kiss you goodbye.
^You give Hera a big, soppy wet one and make your way to university.

earth_travel_choice: ^How do you want to get down to earth? THIS IS THE END
